p: Fresh C. cristata flowers (CCF) were used for carrying out the proximate composition using standard protocols of AOAC (2006). Crude protein was calculated using nitrogen to protein conversion factor of 6.25 (Kjeldahl Method). Total carbohydrate content was calculated by difference using the formula, 100 – (Protein + Fat + Ash + Moisture). Total energy was calculated by using Atwater according to the given equation: Energy (kcal) = 4 (g protein + g carbohydrate) + 9 (g lipid). Each analysis was conducted in triplicates.
